attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Secularism is a defining factor of modern democracies. In many ways the UK is a secular country. However there is one obvious exception - the presence of the CofE Bishops in the House (Lords spiritual). It is about time that we did away with this archaic throwback.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
